options.label: 🏗️ build
options.description: 🏗️ Changes that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)

options.label: 🔧 ci
options.description: ⚙️ Changes to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle, BrowserStack, SauceLabs)

options.label: 🚧 chore
options.description: 🚧 Updating grunt tasks etc; no production code change "grunt task" means nothing that an external user would see.

options.label: 🚀 perf
options.description: 🚀 A code change that improves performance

options.label: 📦 refactor
options.description: 📦 A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature

options.label: 💄 style
options.description: 💄 Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)

options.label: 🧪 test
options.description: 🧪 Adding missing tests or correcting existing tests

options.label: :tada: initial
options.description: 🎉 only used once at the initial commit of the repository

commit-message-editor.tokens.label: Scope
commit-message-editor.tokens.name: scope
commit-message-editor.tokens.description: A scope may be provided to a commit’s type, to provide additional contextual information and is contained within parenthesis, e.g., feat(parser): add ability to parse arrays.

commit-message-editor.tokens.label: Short description
commit-message-editor.tokens.name: description
commit-message-editor.tokens.description: Short description in the subject line.
